PsychicRitualRoleDef.label: target
PsychicRitualRoleDef.allowedConditions: Default, Downed, Prisoner, Sleeping, IdeoUnwilling, Bleeding, ExtremeTemperature, Humanlike, NonHumanlike, Slave, Dead, Baby, Child, Adult, SubHuman, NoPsychicSensitivity

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Psyc.label: Psychic awakening
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Psyc.description: Attempts to awaken or improve the psychic capabilities of the target.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Psyc.outcomeDescription:
Attempts to bind the target to a distant archotech in order to obtain various psychic abilities or to increase their psychic prowess.

However, this process may instead have the effect of fusing the pawn with the archotech, causing them to disappear forever.

Chance of critical failure:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.label: Xen-overwrite
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.description: Scramble the target's geneset with brand new genes.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.outcomeDescription:
Concentrate a large amount of dark archites within the target to rewrite their genetic sequence, causing their old genes to leave room for brand new ones.

This method does not take metabolism limit into account.

Amount of new genes that will awaken within the target:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.label: Xenophagy
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.description: Rip the genes from the target in order to grant them to the invoker.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Xeno.outcomeDescription: Forcefully rip the target's genes by using a dark psychic phenomenon. Some genes may destabilize in the process, effectively nullifying them.\n\nChance of transfer per gene:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Skip.label: Skip migration
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Skip.description: Relocates the colony to a random location in the world.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Skip.outcomeDescription: Concentrate chaotic thoughts into the ritual spot to trigger a disorderly skip process that will relocate the colony to a random location in the world and put the caster into a coma.\n\nDuration of the coma (Days):

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_With.label: Withering chant
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_With.outcomeDescription: Begin chanting various obscure verses that will cause enemies in the region to begin withering once the incantation finishes.\n\nDuration of withering (Hours):

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.label: Void-touch transfer
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.description: Transfer the mark of the Void to another person.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.outcomeDescription: Transfer the touch of the Void to another person. The invoker must be Void-touched in order to successfully transfer their condition to the target.\n\nChance that the target will fall into a coma:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Anom.label: Anom-ally
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Anom.description: Invoke a creature of the Void to fight your foes.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Anom.outcomeDescription:
Conjure a twisted creature to fight for the colony. The higher the quality, the more advanced the summoned entity will be.

The quality will then determine how many creatures will be summoned once it reaches 50%

Amount of summoned creatures:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Ecli.label: Eclipse
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Ecli.description: Shroud the colony with an obscure veil capable of blocking sunlight.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Ecli.outcomeDescription: Execute an incantation that will cause a mysterious veil to block out the sunlight.\n\nDuration of the eclipse (Days):

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Bios.label: Bio-shred
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Bios.description: Shred the target with a dark psychic phenomenon, leaving nothing but bioferrite in their place.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Bios.outcomeDescription:
Assault the target with dark psychic forces, the phenomenon will cause the target to suddenly burst open and turn into bioferrite.

The amount of bioferrite scales with ritual quality and the target's body size.

Amount of bioferrite that this target will grant:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Biof.label: Bioferrite conversion
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Biof.description: Attempt to convert bioferrite into shards of dark archotechnology.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Biof.outcomeDescription:
Infuse a large amount of bioferrite with dark psychic energy, which may result in the bioferrite transforming into twisted shards of dark origins.

Fail chance: 50%
Failing the ritual will cause a Metalhorror to appear.

Potential amount of shards:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Rege.label: Regenerative chant
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Rege.description: Attempts to heal the target's wounds.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Rege.outcomeDescription: Begin an invocation of dark psychic forces to heal the target from small wounds and scars.\n\nChance to heal each wound:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.label: Healing pulse
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.description: Bless the colony with a dark psychic phenomenon.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.outcomeDescription:
Begin chanting dark verses to improve the wound healing speed of creatures belonging to the colony, this dark psychic phenomenon will halve the speed at which their immune system will function for the duration of this condition.

This condition will override immunity pulse.

Duration of the healing pulse (Days):

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.label: Immunity pulse
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.description: Bless the colony with a dark psychic phenomenon.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Hedi.outcomeDescription:
Begin chanting dark verses to improve the immunity gain speed of creatures belonging to the colony. This dark psychic phenomenon will halve their injury healing speed for the duration of this condition.

This condition will override healing pulse.

Duration of the immunity pulse (Days):

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.label: Void cleanse
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.description: Cleanse the target from the dark psychic forces living within them.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Void.outcomeDescription:
Release the target from the grasp of unknown psychic forces to grant them another chance at perceiving the world the same way as most do.

Freeing the target from their condition may cause them to wander around in terror as they realize how far gone they once were.

Chance of terrifying hallucinations:

MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.label: Inhumanizing chant
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.description: Break the humanity of those who partake in this cursed ritual.
MorePsyRitualsSTNL.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.outcomeDescription:
Link the minds of those who participate in this forbidden ritual to a distant engine of twisted origins, which will cause everyone present to lose their humanity as they fall under the influence of this dark hyperintelligence.

Linking to this hyperintelligence may take a heavy toll on the mind, causing them to wander around in confusion as they struggle to comprehend their new alignment.

Chance that every participant will suffer from a humanity break:
